DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate pharmacokinetic profile single dose intravenous ibuprofen administer approximately ten ( 10 ) minute .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetic Study Intravenous Ibuprofen Pediatric Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study evaluate pharmacokinetic profile single dose intravenous ibuprofen administer approximately ten ( 10 ) minute .
DOC.criteria: Be hospitalize male female subject birth ( > 37 week gestational age ) < six ( 6 ) month age . Have clinical indication pain fever . Have write informed consent provide legal parent , guardian , authorized agent prior participation study performance studyonly related procedure . Have inadequate intravenous access . Have uncorrected ductus dependent congenital heart disease . Have history allergy hypersensitivity nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug aspirin . Have current history uncorrected hypovolemia acute renal disease . Have current history acute liver disease . Have receive NSAID , acetaminophen , aspirin drug therapy within four hour prior dose . Have receive another investigational drug within past 30 day . Be otherwise unsuitable study , opinion Investigator .
